article_title: South Dakota Rose Parade Float Hits Streets For The First Time
article_text:
Pierre, SD

The South Dakota Department of Tourism has released an image of what the state is sending to the 2016 Rose Parade in Pasadena, California.

The float saw the light of day for the first time this weekend for a test run in Pasadena. Phoenix Decorating Company, who built the float, will likely perform another test run in September.

The float features imagery that celebrates the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service that goes with this year's "Find Your Adventure" theme, the state's agricultural economy, Native American culture, and the state's wildlife.

The 2016 Rose Parade takes place on Friday, January 1, 2016.

article_summary:
Pierre, SDThe South Dakota Department of Tourism has released an image of what the state is sending to the 2016 Rose Parade in Pasadena, California.
The float saw the light of day for the first time this weekend for a test run in Pasadena.
The 2016 Rose Parade takes place on Friday, January 1, 2016.
Phoenix Decorating Company, who built the float, will likely perform another test run in September.
The float features imagery that celebrates the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service that goes with this year's "Find Your Adventure" theme, the state's agricultural economy, Native American culture, and the state's wildlife.
